result.execSummary:
The defendant Xavier Mandrell Sanders was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Battery [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Certification of SENTENCING HEARING transcript commencing 02-01-2016 received and filed. (16 Pages.) CH
Copy of transcript forwarded to:  ANGEL JOHNSON, PUBLIC DEFENDER, 819 N. 6TH.
Per Order signed on 3/11/2016: Credit amended to 196 days.
Order Amending Judgment of Conviction received and filed with court.

DOC notified postconviction department that the JOC was corrected to reflect that the court imposed a concurrent rather than consecutive sentence.  Case referred to Br. 4 to reconsider the defendant's entitlement to sentence credit.
Per Request and Order signed on 2/26/2016.

records.descr: Request and Order to Correct Clerical Error in JOC

records.addlTxt: Correction to clerical error from 2/1/2016 sentencing hearing. Defendant to serve sentence CONCURRENT to any other sentence, NOT CONSECUTIVE.
Letter to defendant regarding sentence credit with copy of court's 2/4/16 order enclosed.
Letter from defendant regarding sentence credit.
Per Order signed on 2/4/2016:  credit amended to zero days.
Order Amending Judgment of Conviction, signed and filed.
Per order of the Presiding Judge, Misdemeanor Division, this motion/request is hereby assigned to Reserve Br. 4, for review. mag
DOC request to review JOC for possible duplicate sentence credit.

Defendant Xavier Mandrell Sanders in court with attorney Angel Lee Johnson.  Defendant Xavier Mandrell Sanders in custody. Margaret Anne Kunisch appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  

The Court ordered defendant to serve 6 months in the House of Correction, consecutive to any other sentence, with credit for 196 days time served. TIME SERVED DISPOSITION.

Court ordered defendant to pay all applicable court costs and fees by 2/1/2017, or to be docketed as a civil judgment/tax intercept.


Filed;
-Pretrial Incarceration Credit.
Sentencing Hearing on Monday, February 1, 2016 at 1:30 PM in BR 45, CH Rm 515 of the Circuit court of Milwaukee County.

Attorney Angel Lee Johnson in court, defendant Xavier Mandrell Sanders not in court, in custody.  Margaret Anne Kunisch appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Defendant not produced, appearance waived.  State unable to comply with victim/witness notification and requests an adjourned sentencing date.    Court ordered case adjourned for sentencing in Branch 45.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for February 1, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Xavier Mandrell Sanders in court with attorney Angel Lee Johnson.  Defendant Xavier Mandrell Sanders in custody.  Margaret Anne Kunisch appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Defendant prepared to enter change of plea.  Hearing proceeded.  Negotiations set forth by the state.

Defendant changes his plea to GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to his plea, advised of his Constitutional rights and the maximum penalty.   Defendant advised that if not a United 
States Citizen, deportation is possible.  Court found that defendant knowingly, voluntarily and intelligently waived his rights.  Guilty Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and 
Addendum received and filed.  Parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis to sustain defendant's plea.  Court found defendant guilty and ordered a Judgment of Conviction 
be entered on the record.

State requests an adjourned sentencing date in order to comply with victim notification.   Court ordered case adjourned for sentencing in Branch 45.

Attorney Angel Lee Johnson in court, defendant Xavier Mandrell Sanders not in court, in custody.  Margaret Anne Kunisch appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Case scheduled for plea and sentencing.  Defendant NOT produced. Case heard off the record. Defense counsel requests another plea and sentencing date. Neither party requests to address the court on the record. Signed, Filed & Distributed, Agreed Upon Request for A New Court Date form. Case adjourned to Branch 45.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 19, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Angel Lee Johnson in court, defendant Xavier Mandrell Sanders not in court, in custody.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Defendant not produced, appearance waived.  Defense requests a plea and sentencing date.  Court orders case adjourned to Branch 45.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 4, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant advised No Contact Order remains in full force and effect.  Defendant to have no contact with Eddie S. and Dollie H.
  Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Xavier Mandrell Sanders in court with attorney Zoe Everett.  Defendant Xavier Mandrell Sanders in custody.  Benjamin Lindsay appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  hgj.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT.  Scheduling conference scheduled for November 30, 2015 at 08:30 am.
ORDER TO PRODUCE
Cash bond ordered to be forfeited in the amount of 100.00.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Attorney Daniel Gordon Mitchell in court.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Case scheduled for plea and sentencing.  The defendant having failed to appear, the court ordered a bench warrant to issue, any bond forfeited and Judgment of Bond Forfeiture 30 days after notification by the Clerk of Circuit Court.

Attorney Daniel Gordon Mitchell in court, defendant Xavier Mandrell Sanders not in court, in custody.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Defendant NOT produced. Case scheduled for plea/sentencing hearing. Court in trial on another matter.  Signed, Filed & Distributed, Agreed Upon Request for A New Court Date form. Case adjourned to Branch 46.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 9, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Daniel Gordon Mitchell in court, defendant Xavier Mandrell Sanders not in court, in custody, not produced.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant has a felony VOP hold.   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 46. jks
  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for 04-15-2015 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION.  
Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  
Defendant to have no contact with: Eddie S; Dollie H.
Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Xavier Mandrell Sanders in court with attorney Reyna Ivonne Morales.  
Defendant Xavier Mandrell Sanders in custody.  
Gary D. Mahkorn appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Reserve Branch 46.  
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  
Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  
DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 25, 2015 at 08:30 am.
